text:
April 18, 2018 / 1:25 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-U.S. International Trade Commission Says Will Probe Certain Clidinium Bromide-Containing Products After Valeant Pharmaceuticals Filed Complaint -Statement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc: 
* U.S. INTERNATIONAL TRADE COMMISSION SAYS WILL PROBE CERTAIN CLIDINIUM BROMIDE-CONTAINING PRODUCTS AFTER VALEANT PHARMACEUTICALS FILED COMPLAINT -STATEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
